item.title: [Class Suggestion] Loyalist/Turncoat
item.dc:creator: Blackwolfe99
item.description:
Loyalist
Blue Dragon Support

Passives:
Royal Blood - During the election for a new King, votes for you count twice. You will keep this passive even if your class changes.

Day Abilities:
Taste Testing - If target player is Poisoned or Bled during this day, you will take the status instead. This ability will stay on the same person until you change targets. Does not affect Butler’s Nightshade Wine. Can only redirect one Poison or Bleed. - Infinite uses

Night Abilities:
Card Check - Prevent visits from non-Blue Dragon classes tonight. Cannot target the same player two nights in a row. Does not affect the Mastermind while In The Shadows is in effect. - Infinite uses

Goal:
Defeat the Unseen or Cult and any Neutrals who seek to do you harm.

Converts into:

Turncoat
Unseen Support

Passives:
Royal Blood - During the election for a new King, votes for you count twice. You will keep this passive even if your class changes.

Day Abilities:
Numbed Senses - The next time the Assassin poisons a player, the notification will be delayed by a day. - 1 use

Night Abilities:
Sneak Card - You will cause the Assassin to appear as not visiting or attacking to Investigative abilities. Additionally grants the Assassin redirection immunity for the night.* - 2 uses
Tailoring - You will cause target Unseen to appear as a chosen Blue Dragon class tonight. - 2 uses

Goal:
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals who seek to do you harm.

*This applies to Follow/Reveal, Will O Wisp, Scout, and Debauchery/Strings of Mithras.

Read full topic
